edw-ZOpenArchives

== Description

 This is a Zope2 Product that uses OAI2 protocol to harverst and provide OAI2 data.
 It consists of 2 main Products, OAI Server and OAI Aggregator. Both contain harversters.
 OAI Server consists stores cataloged data in a ZCatalog from OAI Harverster's. OAI Aggregator gets it's
 data from remote OAI2 providers. The data can searched via a web interface. This product is based on pyoai
 package

== Authors
  * Alexandru Plugaru (alexandru.plugaru@eaudeweb.ro)
